adv:
It is easy to understand.
I like the bookmark option to remember interesting charts.
It offers alternative solutions.
disadv: When I wanted to answer a particular question than it was hard for me to use related views since they didn't show exactly these parameter I wanted to explore.
comment:
It is a nice Idea for finding "unexpected" correlations or relations, meaning to see aspects in different perspectives. Just because we choosed certain parameters doesn't mean, that they will provide the only and true answer. But as I said for questions regarding particular quantities (like "what speed caused the most damage?"), it felt sometimes superfluous to use the related views.
Thank you for your inspiring work :)
